name: Hitmonchan

ability.name: Forbidden Technique
ability.effect: Hitmonchan is Fighting type, as well as Dark type. Dark and Fighting energies attached to Hitmonchan count as both Dark and Fighting type.

attacks.name: Ebb
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If Hitmonchan takes damage next turn, put 10 of it beside Hitmonchan instead of directly on him. These still effect his health.

attacks.name: Flow
attacks.effect: Take all damage counters that are beside Hitmonchan and put them on the Defending Pokemon.

flavor: He has dabbled in the dark boxing arts.
